resources.string: The passwords don\'t match. Please check and try again.
That password is too short. Create a password that is at least 6 characters long. At least 12 character is even better.
The username you entered is too short. Make sure it\'s at least 5 characters long.
An unknown error occurred while trying to generate your user settings. Try again, and if it persists, please contact support.
You need to pick a username.
You forgot to enter your username.
Are you sure you want to log out?
That username has already been taken.
We don\'t know why the login failed, but the bug has been reported. It may work if you just try again.
There was a network problem. Make sure your internet connection works then try again.
There was an unknown error retrieving the server\'s public key.
Check your connection then try again.
We couldn\'t log you in (unable to unwrap symmetric key).
Network error while trying to restore your profile. Check your connection then try again.
An unknown error occurred while attempting to restore your profile.
There was an unexpected error while trying to complete the login.
Select an avatar or pick your own picture.
The server sent us a malformed response while trying to retrieve its public key. Try again later, and if the problem persists, please contact support.
You will not be able to see their location, and they won\'t be able to see yours. If you want to temporarily prevent them from seeing your location, simply toggle the sharing switch instead.
Move and resize the square to crop your avatar.
The password hash algorithm on your account isn\'t one this version of Zood\u00A0Location knows about. Make sure you have the latest version, then try again.
There was an unexpected error while trying to removing the friend.
Enter your friend\'s username to start sharing your location with them. They\'ll be asked to start sharing with you.
Zood uses your location to show your position on the map, and to securely share it with friends that you\'ve authorized. It\'s never used for any other purpose.
Zood uses your location while it\'s running to display your position on the map.

Background data for Zood\u00A0Location was disabled, so it can\'t share your location while in the background. To fix this, go to \'Data usage\' then enable \'Background data\' in the app\'s settings.
Unable to connect to Zood servers
Zood\u00A0Location is unable to connect to the Zood servers. Make sure your phone\'s internet connection is working then come back to the app. Zood will automatically try to reconnect.
Used to play a sound when you\'re looking for your phone.
Of course! This is where you left your phone. ;-)
There was a problem saving your profile avatar. Try again, and if the problem persists, contact support.
Unable to save your profile avatar. Make sure you have enough free space on your device, then try again.
Zood needs permission to access your location while in the background in order to share it with your friends (only). Go to Permissions in the app settings screen to grant it.
If you wish to verify the security of your encryption with %s, compare the number below with the number on their device.
Temporarily share your location with someone that doesn\'t have Zood\u00A0Location by sending them a link.
Your account information is encrypted on your phone and backed up to our servers. Your information won\'t (and can\'t) be sold to anybody.
Sign in or register a new account to get started.
Share your location with a new friend
Install Zood Location so we can securely share our location with each other. https://www.zood.xyz
Invite your family and friends to Zood, and build a list of the people you trust the most.
Keep track of each other by sharing and requesting location with one another.
Using end-to-end encryption your location is always protected, and we at Zood can\'t even seen where you are.
We need you to give Zood Location permission to access your location in the background. Only people you choose to share with can see where you are.
Zood includes your current activity (whether you\'re walking, biking, or driving) when sharing your location with your friends. It\'s never used for any other purpose.
Zood wouldn\'t be possible without open source libraries. Click any of the libraries below to view their license.
Zood Location needs permission to access your location in order to display your position on the map and share it with your friends (only). Go to Permissions in the app settings screen to grant it.
In order to periodically share your location with your friends (only), Zood needs permission to access your location while in the background.
Zood needs permission to access your location while in the background in order to share it with your friends (only).
Zood needs permission to access your location while you\'re using the app to show your current location on the map.
Zood needs permission to access your location while you\'re using the app to show your current location on the map. Go to Permissions in the app settings screen to grant it.
Zood Location needs permission to access your location in order to display your position on the map and share it with your friends (only).
